system.description:
This spell removes mental defenses from a target, making them highly vulnerable to psychic attacks for 1 hour per caster level. The caster must touch the target, requiring a normal attack roll.

Effects:

  • The target becomes highly susceptible to ESP, clairvoyance, clairaudience, crystal ball gazing, and similar magical detection.
  • All saving throws vs. charm, illusion, phantasms, feeblemind, and similar effects suffer a -8 penalty.
  • The victim receives no warning that their mind is exposed.
  • The spell requires a successful touch attack to take effect.
system.effect: Target suffers -8 to saves vs. mental attacks and is vulnerable to mind-affecting spells
